description: Even when the use_syslog flag is set to true, nova components log to standard error. Using the existing flags it is not possible enable syslog and have nova components not log to standard error.
title: nova components always log to standard error, even when syslog is turned on

comments.content: Even when the use_syslog flag is set to true, nova components log to standard error. Using the existing flags it is not possible enable syslog and have nova components not log to standard error.
